title: Osgood Pie Requires:  Several recipes for pie crust are in the “Desserts and Pastries < Pies” folder.  The pie crust recipe that I prefer is the one titled “Flaky Pie Dough” that uses both vegetable shortening and butter together.
ingredients: ½ cup butter, softened to room temperature
instructions: Beat the egg whites using a blender until firm peaks form then set them aside.  In a separate bowl cream the butter and sugar together then add the egg yolks, spices, vinegar, nuts, raisins and vanilla.  Using a wooden spoon, or any suitable implement, mix everything together until all of the ingredient are well blended.  Finally, fold in the beaten egg whites and pour the mixture into the prepared pie shell.
Bake for 10 minutes at the 400º F. setting then reduce the temperature to 350º F. and continue baking for an additional 20 to 30 minutes; or, until the pie filling is set.
Source:  Pecans Plus,  Taste, The  Morning News, .
